refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: Key bindings for elinks should be placed in a file called ~/.elinks/elinks.conf. Note that any information regarding their format/structure may not be up-to-date. If you will discover that, please feed us with a patch.
Key binding statements are of the form:

listitem.para: is main, edit, or menu.
is a case sensitive key, which you can prefix with Ctrl- or Alt-. Ctrl- must be followed by an uppercase key. See below for a list of valid keys.
is what the key should do. The actions available are dependent on the keymap, and are listed separately below.

refsect1.para: All words/strings may all be quoted "like so". Backslashes are escape characters, even if not between quotes. Lines beginning with a hash character (#) are comments.
Keys can be unbound just by binding them to "none" action. It may be of use if you accidentally type a key often.

refsect1.title: KEYS
refsect1.para: Valid keys are: alphanumeric characters, punctuation, Enter, Backspace, Tab, Escape, Left, Right, Up, Down, Insert, Delete, Home, End, PageUp, PageDown, F1 to F12.

Some keys will need to be quoted or escaped. For example, space can be written as " " (quote space quote), and the quote itself as \\" (backslash quote). Backslash can be written as \\\\ (double backslash).

refsect1.title: MAIN KEYMAP ACTIONS
refsect1.para: The main keymap is used for general browsing.

refsect1.title: EDIT KEYMAP ACTIONS
refsect1.para: The edit keymap is used for editing text fields.

listitem.para: Delete text from cursor to beginning of line.
Delete text from cursor to end of line.
Edit the current textarea in an external text editor. (ELinks only)

refsect1.title: MENU KEYMAP ACTIONS
refsect1.para: The menu keymap is used for navigating menus.
